new-account.subject: Welcome to Gravity
new-account.body: Thank you for signing up to Gravity. If you need any assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

duplicate-user.subject: Important! Your Gravity Account
duplicate-user.body: We noticed you have already registered an account, so we used your original password to save you any confusion in the future.

new_plan.subject: Your Gravity Plan
new_plan.body: Thank you for selecting the {{content.plan}} plan. Your card has been successfully charged {{content.price}}.

new-user.subject: Welcome to Gravity
new-user.body:
Thank you for signing up to Gravity, you can now sign in. 
 If you need any assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

plan-updated.subject: Your billing plan has been updated
plan-updated.body: This is confirmation that your billing plan has been successfully updated to the {{content.plan}} plan.

card-updated.subject: Your credit card has been updated
card-updated.body: This is confirmation that your credit card has been updated. If you didn't change your card, please let us know.

account-closed.subject: We're sorry to see you go
account-closed.body:
This is confirmation that your account has been closed and all of your data has been removed from our servers. 
 If you change your mind, you can create a new account any time.

invite-accepted.subject: Your friend accepted your invite
invite-accepted.body: Woohoo! {{content.friend}} has accepted your invitation to join your team.

password-updated.subject: Your password has been changed
password-updated.body:
Your new password has been saved. 
 If you didn't change your password, please contact us and let us know.

password-reset.subject: You requested a password reset
password-reset.title: Forgot your password?
password-reset.body: Click the link below to reset your password.

invite.subject: Your friend has invited you to use Gravity
invite.body: Your friend {{content.friend}} has invited you to join his team on Gravity. Sign up now to start working with {{content.friend}}.

contact.subject: New message via contact form
contact.body:
{{content.name}} has sent you a new message.

{{content.message}}

feedback.subject: New feedback on your app
feedback.body:
You received a new piece of feedback

Rating: {{content.rating}}

{{content.comment}}

magic_signin.subject: Your magic sign in link
magic_signin.body: You requested a magic signin link for Gravity. Please click the link below to sign in without your password.

new_signin.subject: New sign in to Gravity

blocked_signin.subject: Suspicious sign in blocked
blocked_signin.body: We noticed a suspicious sign in to your account and blocked it for security purposes. If this was you, you can sign in using the link below.

help.subject: New support message
help.body:
{{content.name}} has sent you a new message.

{{content.message}}

new-log.subject: New log recorded in Gravity
new-log.body: A new log was made in your Gravity app, log in to Mission Control to see what happened.
